definition: deficiency/deficit/luckily/it's lucky that.../(often ironically) fancy that...
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: In this paper, expressions of the genus distribution for certain sets of surfaces are provided.
sentences.chinese: 本文求出了一些曲面集的虧格分佈的顯式表達式。

sentences.english: This is the problem of embedding genus distribution for a graph.
sentences.chinese: 這就是圖的嵌入虧格分佈問題。

sentences.english: Therefore, considerable attention is given to the lower bounds on the maximum genus of graphs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，最大虧格的下界的問題引起了人們的廣泛關注。

sentences.english: A new approach for 3D mesh surface filtering is presented.
sentences.chinese: 研究對任意虧格三維網格表面的濾波。
